title: Desperado
sinopse:
Kaoru Shiina, an ordinary high school student who lives in a tedious town where school is boring and there are no place to go to play, his only salvation is the live house where he watch local bands play. His ordinary life started to change when he decided to buy an electric guitar and met the mysterious transfer student, Michiya Kurosu, who owns a black Gibson Les Paul full of knife scars.

(Source: MU)
